title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.322 - Term endowment funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.322 - Term endowment funds

State Regulations

Donated funds which by the terms of the agreement become
available either for any legitimate purpose designated by the board or for a
specific purpose designated by the donor upon the happening of an event or upon
the passage of a stated period of time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.322

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
